sourceOfFunds.purpose: The NGO has not received any state or central government grant. It has utilized only donation given by parent organization other organization. The NGO is completely devoted to the development work in rural backward area .

The sanctioned amount was used for the capacity building for young girls and skill training of SHG members is in the project area. The tailoring classes for SHG members were conducted in village Pilpa. In Fatiabad village SHG Members were trained to make sweet box. Seminar for SHG members and for young girls were conducted on leadership. The purpose of skill training is to empower their economic status and increase their self-confidence. So that they may come out of their poverty.

In Noorpur Block of Bijnor District income generating programs were conducted. In 3 villages 90 SHG members were taught to make Phenyl and washing powder. The SHG members with much enthusiasm learnt, so that they were able to prepare the best quality of phenyl. Having made phenyl they empowered the other women to use the phenyl for cleanliness of their house and surrounding. for the marketing they promoted their own shg groups and their own local market.

In The year 2020 - 2021 the NGO is supported by the parent organization Generalate. The NGO has taken the skill training for income generating program among the SHG members and young girls. in a village 30 SHG members are given training to make Agarbati, and young girls are trained to make jewelry. SHG members are taken for exposure to a soap factory. This financial year is going on, not yet completed . its income and expenditure is not yet audited.

sourceOfFunds.purpose: Sanstha have its own special school that provides education for children with hearing impairment, children. In the special school there are qualified and experienced staffs that use to teach disabled children and take assessment and diagnose their disabilities. Sanstha Charities aim to provide comprehensive and holistic rehabilitation services to transform the lives of the persons with disabilities towards empowerment on rights mode and Access to enabling and empowering environment (A2E).

FLCN covers programs of prevention, identification, early intervention, education, vocational training, livelihood and independent living services, while holistic development programs will provide physiotherapy, occupational therapy, speech therapy, audio logical services, psychological therapy, family support etc. Our organization also works on creating enabling and empowering environment by building capacities in the community towards barrier free environment, community mobilization.
The organization is catering the needs of various categories of persons with disabilities as per the classification of the Persons with Disabilities

We focus on community based rehabilitation (CBR). We have adopted some villages from the district where we organize parents meetings, create employment generation activities like Mother training programme. Now we have extended our services for mental health, old age homes, HIV/AIDS and various other rural development activities particularly for the weaker sections of the society.

detailsOfAchievement: SAMEKIT MAHILA EVAM BAL VIKAS SANSTHAN, Registered Office  A  40, Brahmpuri, Faizabad Road, District Lucknow, in the State of Utter Pradesh . It is Registered under the provisions of Indian Societies Acts 1860, with the Registrar, Firm & Societies, U.P., Lucknow, having its Registration no. 1172 / 1990  91. The Area of Operation of the Society is the Geographical Area of the Country. The Society is a Voluntary Social Organization based on secular, democratic principles & works to promote Social Justice in the provision & distribution of various developmental activities for weaker section of Society along with other Social Welfare programs. Its activities are aimed at achieving the objective of Social & Economic movement through effective networking, lobbing, campaigning & public affairs related activities& also helping to create the atmosphere for promotion of National Programs in achieving the goal. Thus the main objectives of the Society are Welfare of Human Being, Educational & Socio  Economic Development of Weaker Sections Youth (boys & girls). Aims & Objectives of the SANSTHAN have been details in Memorandum of Association. It is a full pledged unit & is running its own activities of Welfare & Development with the help of peoples participation & contribution / donation. The SANSTHAN collaborates with State & Centre on area of common concern, while supporting Infrastructure Development, Skill Development for Self Employment, Income Generating Program for women & youth , ( boys & girls ) Creating of Awareness for National programs & other developmental activities. During past year SANSTHAN had carried out several activities in the sector of skill development of unemployed youths ( boys and girls ) such as Vocational Training of Tailoring, Knitting & Embroidery, Secretarial Practice etc. Beside the organization of Income Generating Training Programs for Farmers, Vermi-compost Training Programme for Farmers & Unemployed Youths Improved Agricultural Practice, Soil Conservation & Reclamation of Land of new allotties of Gram Samaj lessee. Organization of Awareness Camps on National Programs such as Women & Child Health, Population Control, EDP camps, Aids, Pulse Polio, Tree Plantation, Environment Protection & Pollution Control, National Integration & Solidarity etc., have been arranged in the district Lucknow, Sitapur, Behraich, Balrampur, Gonda & Sultanpur. The Sansthan is running an Agriculture Awareness Programme in the Block  Hadhar Mau, in Gram Panchayat  Dudahi, also the Sansthan is trying to run a Rural Development Programme for the people of Dudahi, with the financial help of CAPART. In which the Sansthan will provide free of cost training to the farmers of all villages & also will provide Safe Drinking Water in all Seven Villages of Gram Panchayat  Dudahi. More over the Sansthan will provide Employment based Training to the Women / Girls of this Area, so they may become Self  Dependent. Also the Sansthan will provide Animals to the Unemployed Youths. The Sansthan is running A District Consumer Information Centre in District  Sultanpur, for which the Sansthan has applied to the Ministry of Food & Civil Supplies, Govt. of India to Appoint it as A Nodal Agency of Central Government. The Sansthan is working with the Animal Welfare Board of India. It is caring out its activities for the welfare of Animals in District  Lucknow, Sultanpur, Gonda, Sitapur & Bahraich. The Sansthan is running Veterinary Hospital cum Trauma Centre at Alijanj, Lucknow. The Sansthan is organizing Social Forestry Camps at District  Lucknow in Block  Gosaiganj, In District  Gonda at Block  Haldhar Mau ( West ) , in District  Bahraich at Block  Vishesharganj in last Three Years. Currently society is implementing Computer Training Programme in District - Sitapur with the financial assistance from the Schedule Caste Finance and Development Corporation, Uttar Pradesh Lucknow. Over the years the society has been very active in the fields of : a) Rural Development Programmes with the help of various Govt. Agencies. b) Womens Welfare & Empowerment activities. c) Rehabilitation of Flood affected Families. d) Handicapped Welfare Activities. e) Social Forestry. f) Health Check  up Camps. g) AIDS Awareness Campaign h) Social Rehabilitation of S.C. / O.B.C.s i) Stray Animal Welfare Programs. j) Social Welfare & Awareness For S.C. / S.T. / O.B.C.s k) Rural Sanitation Programme l) Safe & Clean Drinking Water. m) Farmers Training Programme under Rashtriya Sam Vikas Yojana. n) Innovative Health Post A World Bank Funded Project. The society has been well appreciated and recognized by the public and authorities. The following projects have been executed by the society with the financial assistance from state govt./central govt. and on its own: a) Rural Development work at Dudahi, Haldharmau, Gonda. b) Rehabilitation work for flood affected families at Dudahi, Haldharmau, Gonda. c) Social Forestry Camps at Pratappur Upreher, Vishasharganj, Bahraich. d) Stray Animals treatment camps at Lucknow, Sultanpur & Sitapur. e) Employment based training for Womens Empowerment at Lucknow. f) Handicapped Welfare activities at Ramkot, Sitapur. g) Social Rehabilitation Camps for S.C. / O.B.C.s at Allahpur, Hazurpur, Bahraich. h) Rural Sanitation Programme in District  Siddharthnagar with the financial help from Department Of Panchayati Raj. i) Sampoorn Swachchata Abhiyaan in Block  Rampur  Mathura, district  Sitapur. j) Vermicompost Project under Rashtriya Sam Vikas Yojana in 8 Blocks of District Sitapur. k) Innovative Health Post at Birahimpur, Jarwal, Bahraich under U.P.H.S.D.P., A World Bank Project. l) Implementing Computer Training Program Financially supported from Anusuchit Jati Vitt Evam Vikas Nigam at Sitapur.

title: Samoohan Kala Sansthan
detailsOfAchievement: SAMOOHAN KALA SANSTHAN ACTIVITIES AND ACHIEVEMENTS :- A couple of young & dedicated art lovers & dramatist formed a theatre group & named it  Samoohan Kala Sansthan. The purpose was exploring & establishing traditional, folk & modern theatre. Another focal point was to develop the interest of common man in the field of Art & Culture. Samoohan also opens a platform for providing education on different types of performing Art forms. The group also encourages new talents to prove their ability. Since 1997 the group is actively involved in raising different issues of society through its own acts. ACHIVEMENTS:- Sky high enthusiasm & the never say die spirit of the young artists led to several shows of mime play  Ek Sach Ka Maunabhinaya under the direction of Mr. Rajkumar Shah. This is the only group of mime in the state of Uttar Pradesh, which is recognized and has created a mile stone by performing in Purvanchal Mahotsav, Cultural Department U.P. (1998), National Mime Festival, New Delhi (1998), U.P. Sangeet Natak Academy Festival (1999), National Mime Festival, NEZCC, Dimapur (1999), Kolkata (2001), NCZCC (2001), UPSNA (2007) etc. Under sponsorship of Sangeet Natak Acadmy, New Delhi, Samoohan produced & played Sabahi Nachavat Ram Gosain, Ek Vakaya Aisa Bhi & Subhagi. It also organized different workshops for performing arts. For children and young aspirants besides the group also played active role in presenting lot of dramas & shows of Azab Ghazab Duniya Ke Log, Kafan, Girgit, Ek Sach Ka Maunabhaniya, Subhagi, Sabahi Nachavat Ram Gosai, Maya Moh & Soz-E-Watan. Soz-E-Watan  the story of a bloody revolution was based on 1857  freedom struggle. It was a light & sound based unique production. From 2007 to 2009, Nation celebrated the 150th anniversary of the 1857  Freedom revolution. During this period Samoohan has performed six shows of Soz-E-Watan in Lucknow, Allahabad, Azamgarh & Mujaffarnagar. The above shows were conducted with Sangeet Natak Acadmy, New Delhi, NCZCC, District Administration Azamgarh & Mujaffarnagar. Ansal API, Reliance Communication Ltd., SBI, BOB, UBI & many big business organization have extended their co-operation and came forward by sponsoring the shows. In 2007, Samoohan with the joint banner of UP Sangeet Natak Acadmy has organized state drama festival with firm & sound support from District Administration Azamgarh. Under leadership of Rajkumar Shah, who is a National Scholar (Department of Culture, Govt. of India) in the field of theatre and nominated member of UP Sangeet Natak Acadmy Council by UP Govt. , Samoohan has performed in different states of India. The energy level is high & getting good support from audience. The only motto  Lakshaya  is to create and establish awareness towards folk & modern theatre with different aspects of performing arts. This effort by Samoohan is backed by the dedication & commitment of its team towards fresh creation for the betterment of all.
